markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[Thicket of Knives](/Spells.aspx?ID=1017)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=163" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 136 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You create numerous phantom copies of your weapon arm, hiding your true movements and rendering your attacks unpredictable. You gain a +2 status bonus to [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) checks. If you're untrained in Deception, you can use the [Feint](/Actions.aspx?ID=48) action anyway, and add your level as your proficiency bonus despite being untrained.
name: Thicket of Knives

summary: Illusory copies of your weapon arm improve your ability to feint.
summary_markdown: Illusory copies of your weapon arm improve your ability to feint.
text: Thicket of Knives Two Actions Source Secrets of Magic pg. 136 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult Cast somatic, verbal Duration 1 minute --- You create numerous phantom copies of your weapon arm, hiding your true movements and rendering your attacks unpredictable. You gain a +2 status bonus to Deception checks. If you're untrained in Deception, you can use the Feint action anyway, and add your level as your proficiency bonus despite being untrained.
